name: aws-iot-frontend
description: Create a file called 'credentials.js' in this directory. ``` var config = { 	poolId: "", // 'YourCognitoIdentityPoolId' 	host: "", // 'YourAWSIoTEndpoint', e.g. 'prefix.iot.us-east-1.amazonaws.com' 	region: "", // e.g 'us-west-2' 	endpoint : "", // API Gateway endpoint e.g. 'https://prefix-api.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/prod' 	slackWebhook : "", // Slack Incoming Webhook URL e.g. "https://hooks.slack.com/services/test/test/test"  };
